question: Which quarter demonstrates the strongest store performance based on the stacked bar chart?

options.A: Q3 shows the strongest performance with the highest total value.
options.B: Q2 shows the strongest performance with balanced metrics across all categories.
options.C: Q4’s Feedback/Energy segment is largest within its bar (a within-quarter composition statement).
options.D: No overall performance ranking can be made from this chart precisely.

explanation: Unrelated categories are stacked into a single  bar, so the largest total does not mean ‘best performance’. Only within-bar composition statements are defensible; overall rankings from the stack are misleading.
